headline: Schiff, Calling President ‘Vindictive,’ Says He Takes Latest Tweet as a Threat
abstract: In an extraordinary back-and-forth between a president and a congressman, President Trump warned that Representative Adam Schiff, the lead House impeachment manager, “has not paid the price, yet.”
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — Representative Adam B. Schiff, the House’s lead impeachment manager, accused President Trump on Sunday of trying to threaten him on Twitter and urged Republican senators to find the “moral courage to stand up” to a “wrathful and vindictive president.”
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
